name: Hameln no Violin Hiki
description:
In Hameln no Violin Hiki you play the role of Hamel, a sort of wanderer / adventurer whose weapon is… a violin. His music can cover enemies in fear, or even control their minds. Hamel and his mascot Oboe arrives at Staccato, a small town attacked by monsters, and drives them away with his power. Impressed, a cute little girl named Flute decides to go with Hamel in order to find and destroy the evil power behind the attacks.

The game is typical platform. You play as Hamel, and with your violin can shoot musical notes to beat your enemies. However, you count with Flute’s aid. Flute follows you (although you can order her to stop and stay), but also can be grabbed and thrown at the enemies (yes, thrown at the enemies). Flute can also collect through all the stages some costumes that, when worn, give her special abilities, such as flying, leaping, breaking walls or even explode and kill all in screen. At the end of each stage, of course, you’ll find the typical boss, all named as musical instruments.

shot.caption: Title Screen
Intro: A helpless child is about to be sacrificed to the demons
Intro: Suddenly, a young girl name Flute intervenes
Intro: Before the demons can do anything, music can be heard playing from the roof-top and the villagers sees that it's coming from the legendary hero, Hamel
Intro: The music forces the demons' bodies to dance to their deaths.
Intro: Legendary Hero...Hamel...
Intro: First Movement - Legendary Hero
Flute and her grandfather thanks Hamel for his help and asks how much he wants in return.  Hamel only ask (or rather demand...) that Flute follows him.  Flute agrees.
At local shops, you can purchase certain useful items
Get some rest and restore your health at the local hotel
Game Map
Push blocks over spikes and other obstacles so you and Flute can cross
When you see blocks with music notes, play your violin and see what happens!
Demons and enemies are no match against your music notes!
In the castle, you will have to find the key to open the Goal-Door in order to advance
When facing a stone barrier, just throw a near by block or canon-ball to break it down.
If nothing else is available, you can always throw flute at the barrier to break it down (how nice, huh?)
Jump on Flute to help you access high places
Certain areas can only be accessed by Flute and they are indicated by a blue block with a hat
As you advance in the game, you will come across certain costumes you can get for Flute to wear
Choose which costume for Flute wear
Penguin Costume - Allows you to ride across water
The Ostrich Costume - lets Flute carry you across spikes without getting hurt
The Toad Costume - Jump high
Robot Costume - Jump on Flute and her boxing gloves will break down near-by barriers
Curling Costume - allows you to slide flute around and break down barriers in lower areas
When you clear an area, you will get a break down of how well you did. If you were able to collect all 4 stars, then you get to go to the Bonus Stage
Bonus Stage - Collect 100 coins before time runs out
At the end of the Bonus Stage you will again get a break down on how well you did
Game Over screen
